title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar. Build 200201151. Search for references to this field5.
OB: When double-clicking on the search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: The expected behavior is that when double-clicking on a search result, it should be selected.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have source for rt.jar). 2. Open java.io.File. 3. Select the field 'tmpFir'. 4. Double-click on the search result.
